嶒字的基本解释

嶒
céng
〔崚嶒〕见“
崚”。

嶒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［céng］
［《廣韻》疾陵切，平蒸，從。］
(1)高。参见“嶒峻”、“嶒峨”、“嶒嶄”。
(2)见“嶒崚”。
(3)见“嶒嶝”。
[②]［zhēng］
［《集韻》鋤耕切，平耕，崇。］
同“峥1”。

嶒字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶒； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页319第27
【廣韻】疾陵切【集韻】慈陵切，?音層。崚嶒，山貌。【何遜渡連圻詩】懸崖抱奇崛，絕壁駕崚嶒。　又【集韻】鋤耕切。與崝崢同。

嶒字的源字形

嶒字的起名意思

形容山高的样子。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［céng］
["Guangyun" Chi Ling cut, flat steamed, from. ]
(1) High. See "嶒Jun", "嶒E", "嶒嶒".
(2) See "嶒崚".
(3) See "嶒嶝".
[②]［zhēng］
["Ji Yun" hoe ploughing and cutting, flat ploughing, and Chong. ]
Same as "峥1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶒; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 319 27
[Guang Yun] Ji Ling cut [Ji Yun] Ci Ling cut, sound layer. Lang嶒, mountain appearance. 【He Xundu Lianqi Poetry】The cliffs rise up strangely, and the cliffs ride on the cliffs.　 [Ji Yun] hoeing and cutting. Same as Wei Zheng.
